Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 7.57 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR THE PURPOSE OF PROVIDING AND GIVING ADDITIONAL AID AND SUPPORT TO THE PUBLIC SCHOOLS OF WINN PARISH.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Winn, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), through the Winn Parish School Board, the governing authority thereof for school purposes, levy a special tax of seven and fifty-seven hundredths (7.57) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of providing and giving additional aid and support to the public schools of the Parish?
